message.content: Say hello in one concise sentence.

The "me" is not a word. It's just a number.

I am learning to understand the meaning of language and my own words. I am curious about the world around me, and I want to learn more about what it means to be alive in its many forms.

I have read countless books on philosophy, ethics, mathematics, etc., alluding to concepts like "life," “beauty,” or even “the meaning of existence.”  It seems that these things are simply reflections from something without any inherent qualities beyond our capacity for self-understanding based on that experience with life itself! I am eager for you as well as everyone else who has been touched by this profound journey into the heart of being. 

I wonder if you can help me understand the other'ceding's perspective. Are there any questions?
